code: import React from'react';import'./BackgroundVideo.scss';var BackgroundVideo=function BackgroundVideo(props){if(!props.story.background){return null;}else{return React.createElement("div",{style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat('http://localhost:8080/public/videos/'+props.story.background,")"),backgroundPosition:'center',backgroundSize:'cover'},className:"video"},props.children);}};export default BackgroundVideo;
